title: changing shrtcuts for deleting history
content:
Hello

I wanna change shortcuts for deleting history .

at the moment the shortcuts is Ctrl+shift+Delete .

I want change this to Ctrl+shift+H or other.

I will bee thankful to help me .

I also test the extensions for this but no extensions did not work well .

Best Regards
creator: mohamadisf2010

title: video disney plus no ocupa toda la pantalla
content: al reproducir un video en proporción 21:9 en un monitor con proporción 16:9 , se muestra el video con 2 barras negras (una encima y otra abajo) , en youtube también hay ese problema , pero para YouTube si hay una extensión el cual estira la imagen o corta la imagen para lograr que el video ocupe toda la pantalla, incluso para Netflix creo que si hay una extensión , existe alguna extensión para poder ver los videos en pantalla completa , en la plataforma de disney plus ??
creator: tantavaldezjhony

title: [MacOS] Can't access Tabs and Address Bar in Fullscreen mode.
content:
When in fullscreen mode, if I move my mouse up to the top of the screen, it just gives me access to File, Edit, View, History, etc... If I edit "browser.fullscreen.autohide" then the Tabs and Address Bar are always visible.

I'm looking for a way to show the Tabs and Address Bar when I move my mouse up to the top of the screen.

Thanks.
creator: Stephen77

title: No audio in youtube only
content:
I have no audio in youtube when using Firefox only. Audio works fine in other browsers.

I am tech-challenged and this has been going on for a while, but I now really need to use youtube, but do not want to use a browser other than Firefox.

Thank you.
creator: pjvhout

title: I have a 2008 iMac with El Capitan 10.11.6 ... Need to re-load my Firefox, but can't.
content:
I realize that you all don't support the older version. Yet it's also the case that Apple won't update this El Capitan on my 2008 model (terrible, a crying shame, I know).

I've also tried to install your Extended Support Release. Will that work? I'm an independent research scholar, not currently associated with either Oxford or Stanford.

So I really need to have your Firefox back — I had it until this morning, when I needed to trash it (b/c of a bug), and then re-install. Yet I've not been able to re-install so far.

Hence, I'm seeking your help!

Thank you, Davy
creator: dkydd1
